name: Air Fryer Beyond Meat® Brats, Onions, and Peppers
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Plant-based bratwurst is air-fried to crispy perfection with peppers. Serve over rice, if desired.
ingredients: 2 links vegetarian bratwurst sausage (such as Beyond Meat®), sliced
½  green bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
½  red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine vegetarian sausage slices, onion, bell peppers, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl; stir to coat
Pour mixture into the basket of the air fryer
Shake basket and cook for 5 more minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the sausage should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
